content.prompt: Which of the following most directly contributed to Roosevelt’s view that “freedom from want” was necessary?

choices.label: The inspiration of Woodrow Wilson’s vision for an international democratic order
The experience of domestic and global economic upheavals during the 1930s
The memory of federal agencies violating some Americans’ civil liberties in the 1920s
The fear of the Soviet threat to spread communism to nations in the West

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
